name: clusterws
description: ClusterWS - minimal node js http and real-time framework which allows easily scale WebSocket(uWS - one of the fastest WebSocket libraries) between node clusters and utilize all available CPU
author: Dmitrii Goriunov

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run boot
scripts.debug: npm run build:dev && npm run boot
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
